text: to hum ne un ki taraf wahi bheji, ke tu hamaari aankho ke saamne hamaari wahi ke mutaabiq ek kashti bana, jab hamara hukm aa jaaye aur tanvvor ubal pade, to , tu har qism ka ek ek joda us mein rakh le aur apne ahal ko bhi, magar un mein se jin ki baabath hamaari baath pehle guzar chuki hai, qabardaar jin logo ne zulm kiya hai, un ke baare mein, mujh se kuch kalaam na karna, wo to sab duboye jayenge
